answers.a: The centrifugal pump is suitable for large discharge and smaller heads
answers.b: The centrifugal pump requires less floor area and simple foundation as compared to reciprocating pump
answers.c: The efficiency of centrifugal pump is less as compared to reciprocating pump

question: Delivery valve while starting centrifugal pump is kept
The correct sequence of the centrifugal pump components through which the fluid flows is

answers.a: Impeller, Suction pipe, Foot valve and strainer, Delivery pipe
answers.b: Foot valve and strainer, Suction pipe, Impeller, Delivery pipe
answers.c: Impeller, Suction pipe, Delivery pipe, Foot valve strainer
answers.d: Suction pipe, Delivery pipe, Impeller, Foot valve and strainer

question: A centrifugal pump gives maximum efficiency when its blades are ____
The net positive suction head (NPSH) of a centrifugal pump is defined as the sum of the velocity head and the pressure head at the

answers.c: Suction minus vapour pressure of the liquid at suction temperature
answers.d: Discharge minus vapour pressure of the liquid at the discharge temperature
